author: MovieGasm‍․com
description:
👽 PREDATOR: BADLANDS – Official Trailer (2025) 🔥
The hunt returns. In Predator: Badlands, the galaxy’s most feared hunters descend upon Earth’s most unforgiving terrain — a scorched wasteland where survival means staying one step ahead… or becoming the prey. 

🌵 Film Overview:
Set in a near-future dystopian desert region plagued by war and lawlessness, Predator: Badlands follows a rogue military unit and a band of survivors who stumble upon an ancient Predator hunting ground. But these aren’t the hunters we remember — they’ve evolved… and they’re not alone.


A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.
- The audio claims for our promotional features are getting out of hand.


Acquire Specimen XX0522 Synth Humanoid Bio Weapon (2025) Fight Scene - Predator Badlands Movie Clip
Enjoy advanced 4K Upscaling and HDR-10 mastering across future trailers. Stay tuned for more.

description:
Step into the arena once more.
In SPARTACUS: HOUSE OF ASHUR (2025), witness the ruthless rise of Ashur as he seizes control of the Ludus and wages war on tradition. Packed with gladiatorial fury, political intrigue, and brutal spectacle — this is the next chapter of the Spartacus saga unleashed in blazing 4K.
